cgcloud__Condition_Template__c.name: cgcloud__Condition_Template__c
cgcloud__Condition_Template__c.description: Stores the details of the condition template object.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

cgcloud__Customer_Reference__c.description: Describes whether an account reference exists for the conditions of this template.

cgcloud__Description__c.description: Description based on the user-specified language.

cgcloud__Price_Finding_Id__c.description: ID that's used in the code. For example, Product Price or Consumer Price.

cgcloud__Product_Reference__c.description: Describes whether a product reference exists for the conditions of this template.

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: Describes the sales org to which the condition template belongs.
